test.title: Campus to Corporate Life
test.desc: I have noticed that we often spend more time discussing and planning than actually coding or developing. The key to success in this context is to prioritize responding to change over following a rigid plan. This involves taking swift action to resolve issues and bugs as they arise. Before coding, it is important to first create a list of edge cases by white boarding and carefully considering your approach.

test.title: Architecting Software Systems â€” 1
test.desc: For any software system, there are certain requirements which need to be fulfilled. The first one is functional requirements which sits with the core logic of business requirement. Along with this it is also important to focus on the non functional requirements.

test.title: Deployment of Service in AKS
test.desc: Agile mainly focuses on flexibility, customer collaboration, and an iterative, incremental approach to software development. This needs faster delivery, faster co-ordination between the teams. Dev-Ops helps to provide continuous integration, continuous delivery, and continuous deployment, which automate the software delivery process and enable teams to deliver software applications faster and with higher quality.
